channel.title: Mdb on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Mdb on TLDRBins

item.title: Microsoft Access Database
item.description: General mdbtools 0. Installation [Optional] sudo apt install mdbtools Show All Tables mdb-tables <MDB_FILE> $ mdb-tables backup.mdb acc_antiback acc_door acc_firstopen acc_firstopen_emp acc_holidays acc_interlock ---[SNIP]--- Show Tables with Data mdb-tables <MDB_FILE> | tr ' ' '\n' | grep . | while read table; do lines=$(mdb-export <MDB_FILE> $table | wc -l); if [ $lines -gt 1 ]; then echo "$table: $lines"; fi; done $ mdb-tables backup.mdb | tr ' ' '\n' | grep .
